title: Healthcare Member Details
description: Healthcare member details of a person that has or will receive a service or care, such as contact information, primary care physician, and plan information.

xdm:dateAgeCollected.title: Date Age Collected
xdm:dateAgeCollected.description: The date the patient age was collected.

xdm:healthNetAffiliation.title: Health Network Affiliation
xdm:healthNetAffiliation.description: Name of the health network that pcp is affiliated to.

xdm:startDate.title: Start Date
xdm:startDate.description: Date on which the PCP began care for the member.

xdm:endDate.title: End Date
xdm:endDate.description: Date on which the PCP ended care for the member.

xdm:firstName.title: First Name
xdm:firstName.description: First name of the emergency contact.

xdm:lastName.title: Last Name
xdm:lastName.description: Last name of the emergency contact.

xdm:email.title: Email
xdm:email.description: Email address of the emergency contact.

xdm:phone.title: Phone Number
xdm:phone.description: Phone number of the emergency contact.

xdm:relationshipToMember.title: Relationship To Member
xdm:relationshipToMember.description: Emergency contact's relationship to the member.

xdm:preferredAvailability.title: Preferred Availability
xdm:preferredAvailability.description: Patient's preferred day and time availability for an appointment.

xdm:medications.title: Medications
xdm:medications.description: Medication information including ID, start date, and active flag.

xdm:numberOfRefills.title: Number Of Refills
xdm:numberOfRefills.description: Number of refills prescribed by the provider for this medication.

xdm:startDate.title: Medication Start Date
xdm:startDate.description: Date on which the patient began taking the medication.

xdm:endDate.title: Medication End Date
xdm:endDate.description: Date on which the patient stop taking the medication.

xdm:isCurrent.title: Is Current
xdm:isCurrent.description: Indicates whether the medication is current or past.

xdm:isDependent.title: Is Dependent
xdm:isDependent.description: Indicates whether this member is a dependent.

xdm:primaryMemberID.title: Primary Member ID
xdm:primaryMemberID.description: Unique identifier of the primary subscriber if the member is a dependent.

xdm:beneficiaryRelationship.title: Beneficiary Relationship
xdm:beneficiaryRelationship.description: Beneficiary relationship to the subscriber if the member is a dependent (self, spouse, child, etc).

xdm:billingAccountID.title: Billing Account ID
xdm:billingAccountID.description: Unique identifier of the billing account.

xdm:firstName.title: first Name
xdm:firstName.description: First name of the specialist provider.

xdm:lastName.title: last Name
xdm:lastName.description: Last name of the specialist provider.

xdm:specialty.title: Specialty
xdm:specialty.description: Specialty of the provider (anesthesiology, urology, radiology, dermatology, etc).

xdm:healthConcerns.title: Health Concerns
xdm:healthConcerns.description: Array list of all health concerns

xdm:isDeceased.title: Deceased Indicator
xdm:isDeceased.description: Boolean flag indicating if the member is deceased.

xdm:deceasedDate.title: Deceased Date
xdm:deceasedDate.description: Deceased date if the patient is deceased.

xdm:planID.title: Plan Identifier
xdm:planID.description: Unique identifier for the plan enrolled in by the member.

xdm:isActive.title: Is Active
xdm:isActive.description: Boolean flag indicates whether the plan is active.
